Description: Fragment of oval handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora to moderate turn. Clay fine pink-buff. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 136, 1 is perhaps BM 2011,5004.138 rather than this piece. Name Mikythos. From a worn die, possibly the same as that of 2011,5004.138 and a piece from Kaunos, B.Schmaltz, Die Hellenistischen Amphorenstempel vom Kaunos (Asia Minor Studien 79) 108 KA 266.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0541)
